doc:
Harriet MacGibbon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harriet_MacGibbon 0 Harriet MacGibbon (October 5, 1905 – February 8, 1987) was an American stage, film, and television actress best known for her role as the insufferably snobbish, "blue-blooded Bostonian" Mrs. Margaret Drysdale in the long-running CBS sitcom The Beverly Hillbillies. Harriet_MacGibbon ( October_5_,_1905 – February_8_,_1987 ) was an_American_stage , film , and television_actress best_known for her_role as the_insufferably_snobbish_,_"_blue-blooded_Bostonian_"_Mrs._Margaret_Drysdale in the_long-running_CBS_sitcom The_Beverly_Hillbillies .
